mutants.code:
def distributeBooks(books, num_students):
    distribution = [0 for _ in range(num_students)]
    i = 1
    while books > 0:
        give = min(books, i + 1)
        distribution[i % num_students] += give
        books -= give
        i += 1
    return distribution

def distributeBooks(books, num_students):
    distribution = [0 for _ in range(num_students)]
    i = -1
    while books > 0:
        give = min(books, i + 1)
        distribution[i % num_students] += give
        books -= give
        i += 1
    return distribution

    distribution = [0 for _ in range(num_students)]

        distribution[i % num_students] -= give
